item.description:
We'll make plans for tabling at events in Boston this summer, and assess where we are so far. 6:30-8pm.

Wainwright Bank is next door to the Starbucks on the corner of Mass Ave and Prospect Street. If you take the red line outbound to Central Square and get out at the main exit, you'll be at Wainwright's door when you reach street level.
item.name: Boston resolution meeting, Central Sq
